articles.title: Chesapeake Bay Locked in Ice
articles.summary: Nearly 50 years ago, the first Landsat satellite captured the rare sight of Mid-Atlantic waterways frozen over.

articles.title: Live coverage: SpaceX planning pre-dawn Falcon 9 launch from Cape Canaveral of 29 Starlink satellites
articles.summary: Liftoff from pad 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida with 29 Starlink satellites is scheduled for 5:20:50 a.m. EST (1020:50 UTC).

articles.title: Space Force keeps door open to future human presence in orbit
articles.summary:
Officials insist there are no plans to deploy troops in orbit, but commercial infrastructure and cislunar ambitions are reshaping the debate
The post Space Force keeps door open to future human presence in orbit appeared first on SpaceNews.
